modifiers.notes: A varculak needs rest like a living humanoid but sleeps very heavily. When  Asleep, varculaks are hard to rouse, taking a –15 penalty to Perception checks. It takes a full action to awaken a varculak who is  Asleep, although these creatures awaken normally if wounded.
